FCCANALYSIS-PLOTS(1) fccanalysis-plots man page FCCANALYSIS-PLOTS(1)

NAME

fccanalysis-plots – generate analysis plots

SYNOPSIS

fccanalysis plots [-h | --help] [--legend-text-size LEGEND_TEXT_SIZE] [--legend-x-min LEGEND_X_MIN] [--legend-x-max LEGEND_X_MAX] [--legend-y-min LEGEND_Y_MIN] [--legend-y-max LEGEND_Y_MAX] plots-script

DESCRIPTION

fccanalysis-plots is FCCAnalyses sub-command to generate plots out of histograms created in the previous stages of the analysis.

OPTIONS

-h, --help
Prints short help message and exits.
-c, --clean-plots
Completely clean plots directory before compilation.
--legend-text-size LEGEND_TEXT_SIZE
Specify text size for the legend elements. The default value is: 0.035.
--legend-x-min LEGEND_X_MIN
Specify minimal x position of the legend. The default value: automatic.
--legend-x-max LEGEND_X_MAX
Specify maximal x position of the legend. The default value: automatic.
--legend-y-min LEGEND_Y_MIN
Specify minimal y position of the legend. The default value: automatic.
--legend-y-max LEGEND_Y_MAX
Specify maximal y position of the legend. The default value: automatic.

SEE ALSO

fccanalysis(1), fccanalysis-run(1), fccanalysis-final(1)

BUGS

Many
